A magnanimous village head falls head-over-heels for a Premier Padmini car that was given to him temporarily by his brother, when the latter goes out of town for a few days. The car becomes the cynosure not only for the village head, his wife, and the driver, but for the whole village, which celebrates the car as their own. Whether the village head gets to keep the car for himself without parting with it to his brother or his selfish daughter forms the rest of the story.::PipingHotViews
